name: apple-notes-mcp
description: Access and list notes from Apple Notes.app via MCP
long_description: This Desktop Extension provides access to Apple Notes through the Model Context Protocol (MCP). It allows AI assistants to list and retrieve notes from your local Apple Notes.app, enabling seamless integration of your note-taking workflow with AI interactions.

tools.name: list_notes
tools.description: List note titles and IDs from Apple Notes.app with optional folder filtering

tools.name: get_notes
tools.description: Retrieve specific notes by their IDs

tools.name: search_notes
tools.description: Search notes by text content or tags with optional folder filtering

tools.name: create_note
tools.description: Create a new note with Markdown formatted body
